description: Pre-built FOIA request templates for animal agriculture transparency

templates.name: USDA-APHIS Animal Welfare Act Inspection Reports
templates.description: Routine and for-cause inspection reports under the Animal Welfare Act
records: All Animal Welfare Act (AWA) inspection reports, including routine, focused, and for-cause inspections
Pre-license inspection reports
Compliance inspection reports (Form 7006)
Teachable moments documented during inspections
Photographs or video recordings taken during inspections
templates.notes: APHIS publishes some inspection reports on its ACIS database, but historical and detailed enforcement data may require FOIA.

templates.name: USDA-APHIS AWA Enforcement Actions
templates.description: Stipulations, consent decisions, and civil penalties under the AWA
records: Official Warning Letters issued to AWA licensees and registrants
Stipulation agreements and consent decisions
Administrative complaints filed before the USDA Administrative Law Judge
Civil penalty assessments and payment records
License suspension and revocation orders
Pre-litigation settlement negotiations (non-privileged portions)

templates.name: FSIS Slaughterhouse Inspection Records
templates.description: In-plant inspection records for slaughter establishments
records: Noncompliance Records (NRs) issued to slaughter establishments
Memoranda of Interview (MOIs) between FSIS inspectors and plant management
Humane Handling Enforcement Actions (suspensions under 9 CFR 500.2)
Public Health Veterinarian (PHV) reports on ante-mortem and post-mortem inspection
FSIS District Veterinary Medical Specialist (DVMS) reports
Recalls and public health alerts related to the establishment

templates.name: FSIS Humane Methods of Slaughter Act Enforcement
templates.description: Records specific to humane slaughter enforcement
records: All Humane Methods of Slaughter Act (HMSA) noncompliance records
Regulatory control actions (suspension of operations) for humane handling violations
In-plant inspection records documenting inhumane treatment, improper stunning, or sensible animals on the bleed rail
FSIS Directive 6900.2 compliance documentation
Egregious violations reported under FSIS Notice 04-16

templates.name: FSIS Poultry Slaughter Exemptions
templates.description: Custom and other exemption records for poultry slaughter
records: List of facilities operating under poultry slaughter exemptions (9 CFR 381.10)
Custom-exempt poultry facility applications and approvals
State inspection program equivalency reviews
Poultry-specific noncompliance records and enforcement actions

templates.name: EPA CAFO Permits and Compliance
templates.description: NPDES permits and compliance data for concentrated animal feeding operations
records: National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permits issued to CAFOs
Nutrient management plans submitted by CAFO operators
Compliance monitoring reports and inspection records for permitted CAFOs
Notices of violation (NOVs) issued to CAFOs
Consent decrees and settlement agreements with CAFO operators
Annual reports submitted by permitted CAFOs

templates.name: EPA CAFO Water Quality Violations
templates.description: Clean Water Act enforcement against animal agriculture operations
records: Clean Water Act Section 402 enforcement actions against CAFOs
Water quality monitoring data downstream of CAFO operations
Manure spill incident reports and emergency response records
EPA inspections of unpermitted animal feeding operations
Referrals to state environmental agencies for CAFO violations

templates.name: EPA CAFO Air Emissions
templates.description: Air quality data and enforcement for animal agriculture
records: National Air Emissions Monitoring Study (NAEMS) data for animal feeding operations
Air emission inventories reported by CAFOs
Clean Air Act enforcement actions related to animal agriculture
Hydrogen sulfide and ammonia monitoring data near CAFO facilities
Records related to the EPA Animal Feeding Operations Consent Agreement (2005 Air Compliance Agreement)

templates.name: FDA Medicated Feed and Antibiotic Use
templates.description: Medicated feed applications, veterinary feed directives, and antibiotic sales data
records: New Animal Drug Applications (NADAs) for medicated feed additives used in food animals
Veterinary Feed Directive (VFD) compliance reports
Annual antimicrobial sales and distribution reports (by species, if available)
FDA inspections of medicated feed mills
Warning letters issued for VFD violations or unapproved drug use in food animals

templates.name: FDA Drug Residue Testing in Meat and Dairy
templates.description: Drug residue violation data in food animal products
records: National Residue Program (NRP) violation data for drug residues in meat, poultry, and eggs
Tissue residue testing results by species and drug class
Warning letters and regulatory actions for illegal drug residues
Import alerts for animal products with residue violations
KIS (Keep It Simple) testing data from FSIS-FDA coordination

templates.name: OSHA Slaughterhouse Workplace Injuries
templates.description: Workplace injury, illness, and inspection records for meat and poultry plants
records: OSHA 300 Logs (Log of Work-Related Injuries and Illnesses) for meat and poultry processing establishments
OSHA inspection reports for facilities classified under NAICS codes 311611, 311612, 311613, 311615
Citations issued and penalties assessed at slaughterhouses and meatpacking plants
Severe injury reports (amputations, hospitalizations, fatalities) at meat processing facilities
Ergonomic hazard assessments for repetitive motion injuries at processing lines

templates.name: OSHA CAFO Worker Safety
templates.description: Worker safety inspections at confined animal feeding operations
records: OSHA inspections of confined animal feeding operations (CAFOs)
Hazardous atmosphere exposure records (hydrogen sulfide, ammonia, methane) at animal confinement facilities
Manure pit incident and fatality investigation reports
Citations for respiratory protection violations at livestock facilities
Confined space entry violations at animal agriculture operations

templates.name: USDA-APHIS Research Animal Records
templates.description: Annual reports and inspection records for research facilities using animals
records: Annual reports filed by registered research facilities (APHIS Form 7023)
Inspection reports for registered research facilities
IACUC (Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee) protocol reviews obtained during inspections
Enforcement actions against research facilities for AWA violations
Pain and distress category data (Column D and E reports) by facility

templates.name: USDA-FSA Agricultural Subsidy Payments
templates.description: Farm subsidy payments to animal agriculture operations
records: Commodity program payments to livestock, dairy, and poultry operations
Livestock Forage Disaster Program (LFP) payments
Emergency Assistance for Livestock, Honeybees, and Farm-raised Fish Program (ELAP) payments
Livestock Indemnity Program (LIP) payments for animal losses
Dairy Margin Coverage (DMC) program payments
Payment limitation waivers for animal agriculture entities

templates.name: USDA-NRCS EQIP Payments for Livestock Operations
templates.description: Environmental Quality Incentives Program payments for animal waste management
records: Environmental Quality Incentives Program (EQIP) contracts and payments for animal waste management practices
Practice codes 313 (Waste Storage Facility), 359 (Waste Treatment Lagoon), 590 (Nutrient Management)
Conservation practice certifications for livestock operations
Conservation Stewardship Program (CSP) contracts with animal agriculture operations
Technical assistance records for manure management system design

templates.name: USDA-AMS Organic Livestock Program
templates.description: Organic certification and compliance for animal agriculture
records: Organic certification applications and approvals for livestock operations
Organic system plans (OSPs) for livestock (non-proprietary portions)
Noncompliance reports and adverse actions against certified organic livestock operations
Complaint investigation records related to organic animal welfare claims
National Organic Program (NOP) audit findings for livestock certifiers

templates.name: EPA Environmental Justice and CAFOs
templates.description: Environmental justice assessments for communities near CAFOs
records: Environmental justice analyses conducted for CAFO permit decisions
Title VI complaints filed against state agencies regarding CAFO permitting
EJScreen data and analyses for areas surrounding permitted CAFOs
Community health impact assessments related to animal agriculture facilities
Correspondence between EPA and environmental justice advocacy organizations regarding CAFOs

templates.name: USDA-APHIS Livestock Transport Deaths
templates.description: Animal losses during transportation to slaughter
records: 28-hour law (49 U.S.C. Section 80502) enforcement records
Dead-on-arrival (DOA) reports at federally inspected slaughter establishments
Non-ambulatory (downer) animal reports at slaughter facilities
FSIS ante-mortem condemnation records related to transport injuries
Complaints and investigations related to livestock transport conditions

templates.name: USDA Industry Correspondence and Lobbying
templates.description: Communications between USDA and animal agriculture industry groups
records: Correspondence between USDA officials and the following industry organizations: National Cattlemen's Beef Association, National Pork Producers Council, National Chicken Council, American Farm Bureau Federation, United Egg Producers
Meeting calendars and visitor logs for USDA leadership involving animal agriculture industry representatives
Industry comments and USDA responses on proposed rulemakings affecting animal agriculture
Advisory committee meeting minutes (e.g., National Advisory Committee on Meat and Poultry Inspection)

templates.name: FSIS Establishment Grants of Inspection
templates.description: Grants of federal inspection for slaughter and processing establishments
records: Applications for federal grants of inspection for slaughter and processing establishments
HACCP plans submitted by establishments (non-proprietary portions)
Sanitation Standard Operating Procedures (SSOPs) submitted by establishments
Establishment profile data including species slaughtered, production volume, and inspection personnel assigned
Withdrawal or refusal of inspection records

templates.name: EPA CAFO Reporting Exemptions (FARM Act)
templates.description: Records related to CERCLA/EPCRA reporting exemptions for animal agriculture
records: Records related to the implementation of the Fair Agricultural Reporting Method (FARM) Act exemption for CERCLA and EPCRA reporting by farms
Data on CAFO emissions previously reported under CERCLA Section 103 and EPCRA Section 304 before the exemption
EPA analyses of the environmental impact of the reporting exemption
Correspondence regarding the Waterkeeper Alliance v. EPA litigation and its impact on CAFO regulation
